DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Present At Admission Code Sentinel CDM Admission Diagnosis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Executed and carried through to completion._Watching something and taking note of what happens._The result of an action._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Used to indicate position, location, or state._The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection._Indicates whether the diagnosis code is indicative of a condition present at admission.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Present At Admission Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Executed and carried through to completion._Watching something and taking note of what happens._The result of an action._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Used to indicate position, location, or state._The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CDM based on BRIDG 5.1 mc 8.27.18

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicates whether the diagnosis code is indicative of a condition present at admission.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not provided or available.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Not employed or utilized.

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: Sentinel CDM:The Sentinel Common Data Model
